entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 24.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 33 this evening. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 12.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022
